activities: We are an multi-channel marketing automation company that provides services to our clients that send electronic messages. We offer a number of solutions to manage customers’ life cycles, including acquisition, engagement, shopping cart recovery, post-purchase, re-engagement, product recommendation and social and mobile strategies. The dotmailer application provides a platform for our customers to support email creation, technology support for hosting the email subscription process, data hosting, email delivery, tracking results of email campaigns, analysis of data, and transferring collected data back to the client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line and off-line - includes manually processed data
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
